thread.title: Perfect location
thread.title_full: Perfect location - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jennie S
title: Perfect location
text:
The hotel is located right across the street from the Gloucester tube station with connects you quickly all over the city. Only downfall was the concerige seemed to have limited knowledge of the area.
